alert.note: Alert for Halifax (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 03 at 2:18PM EDT until July 03 at 2:45PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM EDT FOR HALIFAX COUNTY... At 218 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southwest of Halifax, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Roanoke Rapids, Halifax, Scotland Neck, Enfield, Weldon, Glenview, Medoc Mountain State Park, South Weldon, Airlie and Tillery. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Straight line winds can blow down trees, power lines, and damage mobile homes and other buildings. Seek shelter in a sturdy structure until the storm has passed. Stay away from windows as flying debris generated by damaging winds can be deadly.
